mapper.insert: insert into Product (pNo, title, link, image, lprice, hprice, mallName, productId, productType, maker, brand, category1, category2, category3, category4) values(0,#{title},#{link},#{image},#{lprice},#{hprice},#{mallName}, #{productId},#{productType},#{maker},#{brand},#{category1},#{category2},#{category3},#{category4});
